import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { GoBell } from "react-icons/go"; import { IoPersonCircleOutline } from "react-icons/io5"; import { CiSearch } from "react-icons/ci"; import axios from "axios"; import "./css.css"; export default function Teacher() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [students, setStudents] = useState([]); // Gọi API lấy danh sách student useEffect(() => { const fetchStudents = async () => { try { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/api/list"); setStudents(res.data); } catch (err) { console.error("Error fetching students:", err); } }; fetchStudents(); }, []); return (

Manage Students

{students.length} Students

{students.map((student) => ( ))}
Student Name Email Status Action
{student.name} {student.email} Active
{/* Modal thêm student (chưa nối API create) */} {showModal && (
setShowModal(false)} >
e.stopPropagation()} >

Create Student

)}
); }
